subject: Education
subcategory: Great Teachers Who Changed the World
title: Every Teacher: The Unnamed Heroes of Education
description: A short lesson to help you apply Every Teacher: The Unnamed Heroes of Education.

hook.text: There are 69 million teachers worldwide. Most will never win prizes or write books. But each one shapes the future

buildup.text: Research shows the single biggest factor in student success isn't curriculum, funding, or technology â€” it's the quality

discovery.text: A great teacher adds $250,000 in lifetime earnings to a classroom of students. The impact compounds across generations.

twist.text: Despite this, teaching is underpaid and undervalued in most countries. The people shaping the future can't afford rent.

climax.text: Every person reading this was shaped by a teacher who saw potential others missed. That's the real story of education.

punchline.text: The greatest teacher who ever lived probably isn't famous. They were just yours.

quiz.question: What does research say is the biggest factor in student success?
